title: Sweet potato chilli chips
description: These sweet potato chilli chips goes really well with burgers or home-made fish fingers and are lighter than regular chips.

method.Step 1: Preheat the oven to 220°C/fan200°C/gas 7. Cut the sweet potatoes into thin chips and place in a roasting tin with the olive oil, lots of salt and pepper, red chilli, and black mustard seeds. Roast for 30-40 minutes, until golden and beginning to caramelise.
